headline: Ondaro Appoints Jason Whitesides as Chief Revenue Officer to Drive Growth and Innovation
summary: SAN DIEGO, September 16, 2025--Ondaro, a ServiceNow Elite Partner, appoints Jason Whitesides CRO to drive growth, expand partnerships, and apply AI on ServiceNow for client value.

headline: Workday Snaps Up AI Startup Sana In $1.1 Billion Deal. Analyst Day On Tap.
summary: Workday agreed to buy AI startup Sana in a $1.1 billion deal. The software maker hosts an analyst day for Workday stock late Tuesday.

headline: Vectice and ServiceNow Announce Partnership to Accelerate AI Governance and Compliance for Financial Services
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, September 16, 2025--Vectice, the Regulatory MLOps platform, announced a partnership with ServiceNow to transform how business, especially banks, deliver audit-ready AI.

headline: ServiceNow Customer Excellence Leader Joins xtype Board to Accelerate Platform Success at Scale
summary: COVINA, Calif., September 16, 2025--xtype today announced that Simon Short, senior vice president of customer excellence at ServiceNow, has joined its Board of Directors. Short has extensive industry experience across both software and customer success, including as former EVP of customer success at Salesforce, former CTO at Capgemini, and global lead for Capgemini’s Digital Customer Experience (DCX) Global Service Line. headline: ServiceNow Expands Global Presence in Fast-Growing West Palm Beach to Drive AI Innovation, Talent Development, and Economic Growth
summary: WEST PALM BEACH, Fla., September 16, 2025--ServiceNow (NYSE: NOW), the AI platform for business transformation, today announced it is expanding its global presence in the fast-growing city of West Palm Beach to drive AI innovation, talent development, and economic growth. Located at 10 CityPlace, a new development by Related Ross in Florida’s Gold Coast innovation corridor, the expansion will include a new regional innovation hub and AI Institute, and is expected to deliver $1.8 billion economic

headline: Exclusive: A giant ‘AI Institute’ is coming to West Palm Beach. Yes, West Palm Beach
summary: Tech company ServiceNow pledges to create 850 jobs as part of an expansion to the Florida city, where employment has grown at a fast clip since 2019.
